img_text: If you are not spinning those particular plates, you might not be aware of the fear that comes from being LGBTQ 1:27 Ban on lesbian love film lifted by court This fear often started when we were children, often when we started to recognise we were different. You see, the world is telling us we're different. Every nice advert and billboard with a straight couple; every well-meaning adult telling us we're boys or girls and what we should wear and play with or who we should fall for
